attributes.action: GIVE BACK DISABILITY PREMIUM TO THOSE ON ESA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst on job seekers allowance and disability living allowance lower rate care component many are in receipt of a disability premium.
this premium is not paid if you change to the new employment and support benefit.
Those on the older equivelent system of income support and incapacity benefit still receive there disability premium.
This fact means many will be a lot worse off than those on the old system.
This is definately some form of discrimination.
If are having simurlar problems please sign the petition.
Thank you
Lord Anthony Douglas

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
